languages.text: "Будто вещий дух, ты указывал{mf||а} мне на мою тропу, эттфатер, пока очи мои не открылись".
"Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."
languages.original_text: "Будто вещий дух, ты указывал{mf||а} мне на мою тропу, эттфатер, пока очи мои не открылись".

traits.locale_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Como un espíritu del mismo sino, Aett-Vater, me mostró el camino a seguir cuando mis ojos no podían verlo».
languages.original_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."

traits.locale_text: «Como un espíritu del mismo sino, Aett-Vater, me mostró el camino a seguir cuando mis ojos no podían verlo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你就像命运之魂一样。当我目不视物的时候，是你为我指明了道路，狼领。”
languages.original_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."

traits.locale_text: “你就像命运之魂一样。当我目不视物的时候，是你为我指明了道路，狼领。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺の目はまだ閉じていたのに、あんたはまるで運命の精霊のように、俺の道を示してくれた、アエット＝ヴァテル」
languages.original_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の目はまだ閉じていたのに、あんたはまるで運命の精霊のように、俺の道を示してくれた、アエット＝ヴァテル」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Tel un esprit du wyrd, vous m'avez ouvert les yeux et montré la voie, aett-vater. »
languages.original_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."

traits.locale_text: « Tel un esprit du wyrd, vous m'avez ouvert les yeux et montré la voie, aett-vater. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wie ein Geist des Wyrd selbst habt Ihr mir meinen Pfad aufgezeigt, Aett-Vater, als meine Augen ihn noch nicht sehen konnten."
languages.original_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."

traits.locale_text: "Wie ein Geist des Wyrd selbst habt Ihr mir meinen Pfad aufgezeigt, Aett-Vater, als meine Augen ihn noch nicht sehen konnten."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."

languages.text: "Gözlerimi gerçeğe kapatmış olsam da kaderin ruhu gibi bana yol gösterdin Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "Like a spirit of wyrd itself, you showed me my path, Aett-Vater, while my eyes were still closed to it."

traits.locale_text: "Gözlerimi gerçeğe kapatmış olsam da kaderin ruhu gibi bana yol gösterdin Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
